title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
Transform your Christmas gatherings and meals with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. These beautiful polyester napkins feature a smooth and glossy finish with stunning blue color and gold embroidered texts, adding a touch of elegance to your table setting. The religious-themed designs, including 'Joy', 'Love', 'Blessed', 'Merry', 'Believe', and 'Peace', bring a meaningful touch to your festive occasions.

Not only are these napkins visually appealing, but they are also practical with their washable and reusable nature, making them perfect for Christmas, religious, or festive occasions. Share the joy and excitement of the holiday season by gifting these thoughtful napkins to your family, friends, or fellow believers. Each package contains 12 beautifully embroidered Christmas cloth napkins, each measuring 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm).
